name: Alchemy Disaster
description:
This game was made in 48 jours for the Game Maker's Toolkit annual Game Jam (2021)

      

The two magic apprentices Riki and Nana accidentaly started a fire

Now they have to defend Lele while he brews a potion to extinguish the fire!

WASD to control Riki (red)

Arrow keys to control Nana (blue)

You can create a stream of water by bumping into each other, but if you get too far from each other, it breaks

Made with C# and the MonoGame library.

Programmer: Patrick Grenier (Nelife)

Artist and music composer: Lucas Mendes Zoglio (Lymze)
